data.description: Generating unique random values from strings
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Data::Libra generate random values from a string. If you scan the
    same strings, you will get the same values. It works like "Barcode
    Battler" or "Monster Rancher(Monster Farm)".

    It merely works as a hash function, but you can use this module
    more easily than using raw crypt() or Digest::*. This might be
    convenient to make the fortune-telling and the game.
